customCmdGetNumUpdates: a="$(dnf check-upgrade --refresh -q | grep -c '^[a-z0-9]')"; b="$(brew upgrade -n | sed -nE 's/.*([0-9]+) outdated packages:/\1/p')"; echo "$((a+b))"
customCmdDoSystemUpdate: bash -c 'gum confirm "Update dnf packages?" && sudo dnf upgrade -y --refresh; gum confirm "Update brew packages?" && brew upgrade && echo "Update Complete!" && sleep 2'
